executionPlan.name: CurveFinderOfHealthRequest
executionPlan.description: This will find the curve finder of health stats over a minute.
executionPlan.queryExpressions: from health_curve_finder_request select member_id, cluster_id, cluster_instance_id, network_partition_id, health_description, time_stamp, a, b, c stratos:concat(cluster_id, '-' ,cluster_instance_id) as health_curve_finder_cluster_network insert into health_curve_finder_concat; define partition health_curve_finder_cluster_partition by health_curve_finder_concat.health_curve_finder_cluster_network; from health_curve_finder_concat [health_description == 'memory_consumption'] #window.stratos:curveFitting(10 min, a, b, c) select cluster_id, cluster_instance_id, network_partition_id, time_stamp, a, b, c insert into curve_finder_memory_consumption_stats partition by health_curve_finder_cluster_partition; from health_curve_finder_concat [health_description == 'load_average'] #window.stratos:curveFitting(10 min, a, b, c) select cluster_id, cluster_instance_id, network_partition_id, time_stamp, a, b, c insert into curve_finder_load_average_stats partition by health_curve_finder_cluster_partition; define partition health_curve_finder_member_partition by health_curve_finder_request.member_id; from health_curve_finder_request [health_description == 'memory_consumption'] #window.stratos:curveFitting(10 min, a, b, c) select member_id, cluster_id, cluster_instance_id, network_partition_id, time_stamp, a, b, c insert into member_curve_finder_memory_consumption_stats partition by health_curve_finder_member_partition; from health_curve_finder_request [health_description == 'load_average'] #window.stratos:curveFitting(10 min, a, b, c) select member_id, cluster_id, cluster_instance_id, network_partition_id, time_stamp, a, b, c insert into member_curve_finder_load_average_stats partition by health_curve_finder_member_partition;
